landingPage.title: Welcome to your IoTCloudStarter App
landingPage.subtitle: A highly customizable IoTCloudStarter application to manage IoT Devices

highlights.title: Engage
highlights.content: Handle all IoT related requests in a single place - e.g. manage gateways, manage devices, view device data.

highlights.title: Collaborate
highlights.content: Collaborate on open and interoperable IoT solutions built on open standards

highlights.title: Track
highlights.content: Track and respond to high priority devices using alerts and actions
